sentences.sContent: He was stabbed with a dagger.
The murderer dubbed a dagger into his heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: The murderer dubbed a dagger into his heart.
sentences.sCn: 凶手将匕首刺进他的心脏。

sentences.sContent: He was heavily armed—an air rifle in one hand, a wooden dagger in the other.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was heavily armed—an air rifle in one hand, a wooden dagger in the other.
sentences.sCn: 他可是全副武装呢，一只手拿着气枪，另一只手握着一把木制匕首。

trans.tranOther: a short pointed knife used as a weapon
